languages.text: {n}Кассия хмурится и касается раскаляющегося {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}камня под кожей{/d}.{/n} "Даже если бы я желала произвести экзекуцию самостоятельно... Камень предателя ограничивает мои силы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия хмурится и сжимает амулет на шее.{/n} "Даже если бы я желала произвести экзекуцию самостоятельно... Амулет предателя ограничивает мои силы".

languages.text: {n}Cassia frowns and touches the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} that is heating up under her skin.{/n} "Even if I wanted to carry out the execution personally... The traitor's artefact is limiting my powers."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия хмурится и касается раскаляющегося {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}камня под кожей{/d}.{/n} "Даже если бы я желала произвести экзекуцию самостоятельно... Камень предателя ограничивает мои силы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia frowns and clutches the amulet on her neck.{/n} "Even if I wanted to carry out the execution personally... The traitor's amulet is limiting my powers."
{n}Cassia frowns and clutches the amulet on her neck.{/n} "Even if I wanted to carry out the execution personally... The traitor's amulet is limiting my powers."
{n}Cassia frowns and clutches the amulet on her neck.{/n} "Even if I wanted to carry out the execution personally... The traitor's amulet is limiting my powers."
{n}Cassia frowns and clutches the amulet on her neck.{/n} "Even if I wanted to carry out the execution personally... The traitor's amulet is limiting my powers."
{n}Cassia frowns and touches the stone that is heating up under her skin.{/n} "Even if I wanted to carry out the execution personally... The traitor's artefact is limiting my powers."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅皱着眉头，摸着皮肤下面越来越烫的{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}石头{/d}。{/n}“就算是我真的想亲手处决她……那个叛徒的造物也在限制我的力量。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns and touches the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} that is heating up under her skin.{/n} "Even if I wanted to carry out the execution personally... The traitor's artefact is limiting my powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅皱着眉头，握紧了脖子上的护身符。{/n}“就算是我真的想亲手处决她……那个叛徒的护身符也在限制我的力量。”

languages.text: {n}Cassia frunce el ceño y se toca la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}piedra{/d} que se calienta bajo su piel.{/n} «Aunque quisiera ejecutar personalmente la sentencia... el artefacto de la traidora inhibe mis poderes».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns and touches the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} that is heating up under her skin.{/n} "Even if I wanted to carry out the execution personally... The traitor's artefact is limiting my powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia frunce el ceño y sujeta el amuleto que lleva al cuello.{/n} «Aunque quisiera ocuparme personalmente de la ejecución... el amuleto de la traidora inhibe mis poderes».

languages.text: {n}Cassia runzelt die Stirn und berührt den {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}Stein{/d}, der sich unter ihrer Haut erhitzt.{/n} "Selbst wenn ich die Hinrichtung selbst durchführen wollte ... Das Artefakt des Verräters schwächt meine Kräfte."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns and touches the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} that is heating up under her skin.{/n} "Even if I wanted to carry out the execution personally... The traitor's artefact is limiting my powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia verzieht das Gesicht und umklammert das Amulett an ihrem Hals.{/n} "Selbst wenn ich die Hinrichtung selbst durchführen wollte ... das Amulett des Verräters schwächt meine Kräfte."

languages.text: {n}Les sourcils froncés, Cassia effleure la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}pierre{/d} qui chauffe sous sa peau.{/n} « Même si je voulais exécuter la sentence moi-même... l'artefact de la traîtresse limite mes pouvoirs. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns and touches the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} that is heating up under her skin.{/n} "Even if I wanted to carry out the execution personally... The traitor's artefact is limiting my powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les sourcils froncés, Cassia serre dans sa main l'amulette qui pend autour de son cou.{/n} « Même si je voulais exécuter la sentence moi-même... L'amulette de la traîtresse limite mes pouvoirs. »

languages.text: {n}カシアは顔を曇らせ、皮膚の下で熱を放つ{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}石{/d}に触れた。{/n}「あたくしが個人的な思いで処刑を望んだとしても…裏切り者のアーティファクトがこの力を押さえつけているのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns and touches the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} that is heating up under her skin.{/n} "Even if I wanted to carry out the execution personally... The traitor's artefact is limiting my powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは顔を曇らせ、皮膚の下で熱を放つ{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}石{/d}に触れた。{/n}「あたくしが個人的な思いで処刑を望んだとしても…裏切り者のアーティファクトがこの力を押さえつけているのです」

languages.text: {n}Cassia, kaşlarını çatıp teninin altında ısınan {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}taşa{/d} dokunuyor.{/n} "İdamı bizzat gerçekleştirmek isteseydim bile hainin eseri güçlerimi sınırlıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns and touches the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} that is heating up under her skin.{/n} "Even if I wanted to carry out the execution personally... The traitor's artefact is limiting my powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia kaşlarını çatıyor ve teninin altında yanan taşa dokunuyor.{/n} "İdamı bizzat gerçekleştirmek isteseydim bile hainin eseri güçlerimi sınırlıyor."
